subject: Ghost band opening?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Like a radio band, but from the nether world. I was getting something about
the communications opening alittle Sunday night, then much more on
Wednesday.  I'm not sure if it means anything, but maybe they can get
through better.

 F-S
